General.Name: Minna Padi Investama Tbk
General.Description: PT Minna Padi Investama Sekuritas Tbk engages in the securities brokerage and underwriting activities in Indonesia. It provides brokerage services for equity and fixed income securities in primary and secondary market; and underwriting services for initial public offerings, right issues, and bonds. The company was formerly known as PT Minna Padi Investama Tbk and changed its name to PT Minna Padi Investama Sekuritas Tbk in March 2017. PT Minna Padi Investama Sekuritas Tbk was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
